Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Economic Development and the Select Committee on Community Development
Resolution calling on the City of New York to create an emergency transitional jobs program targeted at increasing job opportunities and addressing structural underemployment.
Items.MatterName: Create an emergency transitional jobs program targeted at increasing job opportunities and addressing structural underemployment.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the City of New York to create apprenticeship and job opportunity programs through which unemployed New Yorkers can participate in upcoming public infrastructure projects.
Items.MatterName: Create apprenticeship and job opportunity programs through which unemployed New Yorkers can participate in upcoming public infrastructure projects.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the City Council to convene an emergency summit to address the concerns highlighted in the recent Community Service Society report, “A Crisis in Black Male Employment,” including the need for employment services, training, and educational and technological programs, which specifically target the employment disparities and disadvantages facing the African-American community.
Items.MatterName: Community Service Society report, "A Crisis in Black Male Employment."

Items.Title: Oversight - Fighting Unemployment in New York City and Examining the City's Workforce Development System.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Fighting Unemployment in New York City and Examining the City's Workforce Development System.
